publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1373 Michael Matheson: Falkirk Mini-Olympics-That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk Council on organising a mini-Olympic games where 1,800 pupils from 51 primary schools will compete together in a variety of sports; welcomes the fact that each school will represent a chosen country; wishes the participants well at the centre of excellence in Grangemouth Stadium, and believes that the pupils will enter into the true spirit of the Olympic movement.
S2M-1373 Falkirk Mini-Olympics (lodged on 27 May 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Fiona Hyslop*, Fergus Ewing*
S2M-1373 Falkirk Mini-Olympics (lodged on 27 May 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Ms Sandra White*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1373 Falkirk Mini-Olympics (lodged on 27 May 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1373 Falkirk Mini-Olympics (lodged on 27 May 2004) Dennis Canavan*
